title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Sean Payton's Next Move and Nick Wright on Rodgers Landing Spots, Brady Retirement Talk
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Sean Payton's Next Move and Nick Wright on Rodgers Landing Spots, Brady Retirement Talk
description:
Colin gives his take on Sean Payton's next move and why it won't be coaching. (3:00). Then, First Things First co-host Nick Wright joins Colin for a wide-ranging and unique conversation about football and family. They discuss Nick's theory on why the Cowboys, Packers, and Titans lost (5:00), how the NFL's offensive explosion has changed the draft (13:00), some radical solutions to fix NFL OT rules after the controversial Bills/Chiefs finish (15:00), how Aaron Rodgers could wind up on the Buccaneers if Tom Brady retires (23:00), if Brady's family should urge him to keep playing (28:00), how they balanced work and family in their careers (38:00), the latest amazing revelation about Patrick Mahomes (42:00), and why Aaron Rodgers has become so insufferable (46:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
